title: [Health] Sleep disturbances, fatigue common in patients who recovered from COVID. More than two-thirds of patients (67.2%) reported at least moderate fatigue, while 21.8% reported severe fatigue. Eight percent reported severe sleep disturbances, and 41.3% reported at least moderate sleep disturbances.
